sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Make the existing demands with Category and Type "Idea"  to default values  "Strategic" and "Project".</description>
        <name>Fix Demand Data for Category Idea</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var demand = new GlideRecord("dmn_demand");
demand.addQuery("category", "idea");
demand.query();
while(demand.next()){
	demand.setValue("category", "strategic");
	demand.setValue("type", "project");
	demand.setWorkflow(false);
	demand.update();
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2014-12-10 22:53:17</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>b3ff9fd3d7303100b7490ee60e6103f1</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Fix Demand Data for Category Idea</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Demand Management" source="com.snc.demand_management">82005a2b47e64210cd4e1ce4316d4346</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_b3ff9fd3d7303100b7490ee60e6103f1</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2014-12-10 22:53:50</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Fix Demand Data for Category Idea
